mapper.insert: insert into qnaboard (id, hit, nickName, content, title) values(#{id}, #{hit}, #{nickName}, #{content}, #{title})
mapper.update: update qnaboard set title = #{title}, content = #{content} where qboardNo = #{qboardNo}
mapper.select: select qboardNo, id, hit, nickName, content, title from qnaboard where qboardNo;
